semantic_identifier: [GOLD-148]: Add “Unmatched identities” review queue with match suggestions and bulk linking
title: Add “Unmatched identities” review queue with match suggestions and bulk linking

sections.text: Create an admin-facing queue that lists ticket identities that failed automatic account linking, showing the raw + canonicalized signals and the top suggested account matches. Allow users to confirm a link, create a new account, or mark as “ignore/unknown,” with bulk actions for repeated identities (same email/domain/company). Persist overrides as explicit mapping rules so future ingests auto-link without additional cleanup.
